title: Finding Sherlock Holmes In America
description: This is a non fiction book that chronicles places in the United States that mystery fans and Sherlockian's in particular would be interested in. The book includes more than 600 places across the USA whose very names remind us of the wonderful stories created by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Places like Doyle, Tennessee; Holmesville, Ohio; Mount Bohemia; New London, Texas; Moriarty, New Mexico; Sherlock Peak; and Watsonville, California just for example. GPS coordinates and a link to a scalable map is provided for every item to help you easily find each location. In addition to the Sherlock named places, the book also includes listings for museums, mystery bookstores, mystery conventions, mystery dinners, mystery weekends, pubs & restaurants, Sherlock related societies and more all organized by state and city within each state. In short everything a mystery fan would want to know if he or she lived in or were traveling to a particular city or state in America. The book is a compendium of information with active hyperlinks for more than 1900 total items. As such it makes a perfect ebook for your smartphone, tablet or laptop computer.
author: Rick Etchells
